EmailTemplate.name: 18-Bus @ Cloud Spd-Peering Engineering-Email-EmailSeriesPeerng-T003Q5.Email 2.1
EmailTemplate.subject: Are "fat fingers" increasing your peering costs?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Reduce operational costs with automated peering Manual processes for managing peering are costly, with "fat finger" config errors making matters even worse. Read our blog <[[http://pf.content.nokia.com/webscale-peering-hub/bring-insight-blog?lb_email={{lead.Email Address}}&did=d000000001ed&utm_campaign=peering_engineering&utm_source=email-list-marketo-webscale&utm_medium=email&utm_content=bringing-insight-blog&utm_term=peering-initial]]> to find out how automated peering engineering helps reduce operational costs.
